doc:
Isabelle Nanty https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Isabelle_Nanty 0 Isabelle Nanty (born 21 January 1962) is a French actress, film and theatre director and screenwriter. She was a teacher for several years at the Cours Florent, and then received a nomination for the César Award for Most Promising Actress for her performance in Tatie Danielle (1990), and two nominations for the César Award for Best Supporting Actress for Amélie (2001) and Not on the Lips (2003). She's also known for her roles in La Belle Histoire (1992) directed by Claude Lelouch, Les Visiteurs (1993), Asterix Obelix: Mission Cleopatra (2002), her leading role in Les Tuche (2011), Serial Teachers (2013) and the sequel Serial Teachers 2 (2015). Isabelle_Nanty ( born 21_January_1962 ) is a_French_actress_,_film_and_theatre_director_and_screenwriter . She was a_teacher for several_years at the_Cours_Florent , and then received a_nomination for the_César_Award for Most_Promising_Actress for her_performance in Tatie_Danielle_(_1990_) , and two_nominations for the_César_Award for Best Supporting_Actress for Amélie_(_2001_) and Not on the_Lips ( 2003_) . She 's_also_known for her_roles in La_Belle_Histoire_(_1992 ) directed by Claude_Lelouch , Les_Visiteurs_(_1993_)_,_Asterix_ : Mission_Cleopatra_(_2002 ) , her_leading_role in Les_Tuche_(_2011_) , Serial_Teachers ( 2013_) and the_sequel_Serial_Teachers 2_(_2015_) .
